name: Rollout Knockout
description:
Participate in this 'rolling' game show and participate in a serie of challanges.

See you you can win a gaundlet of challanges while inside a ball or fail gloriously!

And even if you win, you might just still be a loser in the end...

Made for the 11º Univali Game Jam.

Controls: 

P1 : AWSD, [SPACE BAR]

P2 :[ Arrow Keys],  [ENTER]
